verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Every man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> his own דִּגְל֤וֹ <S%H1714><s%> by his own standard בְאֹתֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> with the ensign לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> of their father's יַחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> shall pitch בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִנֶּ֕גֶד <S%H5048><s%> far off סָבִ֥יב <S%H5439><s%> about לְאֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation יַחֲנֽוּ׃ <S%H2583><s%> shall they pitch

וְהַחֹנִים֙ <S%H2583><s%> pitch קֵ֣דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> And on the east side מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> toward the rising דֶּ֛גֶל <S%H1714><s%> of the sun shall they of the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> throughout their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H5177><s%> and Nahshon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <S%H5992><s%> of Amminadab

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <S%H702><s%> four וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

וְהַחֹנִ֥ים <S%H2583><s%> And those that do pitch עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> next מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> next unto him [shall be] the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> and Nethaneel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children צוּעָֽר׃ <S%H6686><s%> of Zuar

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <S%H702><s%> and four וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> thereof [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred ס

מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> [Then] the tribe זְבוּלֻ֑ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the son זְבוּלֻ֔ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <S%H446><s%> and Eliab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children חֵלֹֽן׃ <S%H2497><s%> of Helon

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered שִׁבְעָ֧ה <S%H7651><s%> and seven וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> thereof [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <S%H6485><s%> All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> in the camp יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מְאַ֨ת <S%H3967><s%> [were] an hundred אֶ֜לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> and fourscore אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֵֽׁשֶׁת־ <S%H8337><s%> and six אֲלָפִ֥ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> and four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> throughout their armies רִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> These shall first יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> set forth ס

דֶּ֣גֶל <S%H1714><s%> [shall be] the standard מַחֲנֵ֧ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp רְאוּבֵ֛ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben תֵּימָ֖נָה <S%H8486><s%> On the south side לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> according to their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children רְאוּבֵ֔ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben אֱלִיצ֖וּר <S%H468><s%> [shall be] Elizur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <S%H7707><s%> of Shedeur

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <S%H8337><s%> and six וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <S%H705><s%> thereof [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

וְהַחוֹנִ֥ם <S%H2583><s%> And those which pitch עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> next מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> by him [shall be] the tribe שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon שְׁלֻמִיאֵ֖ל <S%H8017><s%> [shall be] Shelumiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צוּרִֽי־ שַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H6701><s%> of Zurishaddai

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered תִּשְׁעָ֧ה <S%H8672><s%> and nine וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> of them [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

וְמַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> Then the tribe גָּ֑ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <S%H460><s%> [shall be] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְעוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H7467><s%> of Reuel

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> and five וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <S%H705><s%> of them [were] forty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <S%H2572><s%> and fifty

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <S%H6485><s%> All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> in the camp רְאוּבֵ֗ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben מְאַ֨ת <S%H3967><s%> [were] an hundred אֶ֜לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> and one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> and four מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> throughout their armies וּשְׁנִיִּ֖ם <S%H8145><s%> in the second rank יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> And they shall set forth ס

וְנָסַ֧ע <S%H5265><s%> shall set forward אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> Then the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> with the camp הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַֽמַּחֲנֹ֑ת <S%H4264><s%> of the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> as they יַחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> as they encamp כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so יִסָּ֔עוּ <S%H5265><s%> so shall they set forward אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his place לְדִגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1714><s%> by their standards ס

דֶּ֣גֶל <S%H1714><s%> [shall be] the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp אֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim לְצִבְאֹתָ֖ם <S%H6635><s%> according to their armies יָ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> On the west side וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <S%H476><s%> [shall be] Elishama בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <S%H5989><s%> of Ammihud

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> of them [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

וְעָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> Next מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> And by him [shall be] the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <S%H1583><s%> [shall be] Gamaliel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פְּדָהצֽוּר׃ <S%H6301><s%> of Pedahzur

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered שְׁנַ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> of them [were] thirty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3967><s%> and two hundred

וּמַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> Then the tribe בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <S%H27><s%> [shall be] Abidan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גִּדְעֹנִֽי׃ <S%H1441><s%> of Gideoni

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered חֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <S%H2568><s%> and five וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> of them [were] thirty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <S%H6485><s%> All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim מְאַ֥ת <S%H3967><s%> [were] an hundred אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁמֹֽנַת־ <S%H8083><s%> and eight אֲלָפִ֥ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> throughout their armies וּשְׁלִשִׁ֖ים <S%H7992><s%> in the third rank יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> And they shall go forward ס

דֶּ֣גֶל <S%H1714><s%> The standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp דָ֛ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan צָפֹ֖נָה <S%H6828><s%> [shall be] on the north side לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> by their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children דָ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H295><s%> [shall be] Ahiezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H5996><s%> of Ammishaddai

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered שְׁנַ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <S%H8346><s%> of them [were] threescore אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> and seven מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

וְהַחֹנִ֥ים <S%H2583><s%> And those that encamp עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> next מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> by him [shall be] the tribe אָשֵׁ֑ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children אָשֵׁ֔ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <S%H6295><s%> [shall be] Pagiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <S%H5918><s%> of Ocran

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered אֶחָ֧ד <S%H259><s%> and one וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <S%H705><s%> of them [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

וּמַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> Then the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children נַפְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali אֲחִירַ֖ע <S%H299><s%> [shall be] Ahira בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֵינָֽן׃ <S%H5881><s%> of Enan

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> and those that were numbered שְׁלֹשָׁ֧ה <S%H7969><s%> and three וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> of them [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> that הַפְּקֻדִים֙ <S%H6485><s%> All they that were numbered לְמַ֣חֲנֵה <S%H4264><s%> in the camp דָ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan מְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> [were] an hundred אֶ֗לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשִׁבְעָ֧ה <S%H7651><s%> and seven וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six מֵא֑וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred לָאַחֲרֹנָ֥ה <S%H314><s%> hindmost יִסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> They shall go לְדִגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1714><s%> with their standards פ

אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These פְּקוּדֵ֥י <S%H6485><s%> These [are] those which were numbered בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> that פְּקוּדֵ֤י <S%H6485><s%> all those that were numbered הַֽמַּחֲנֹת֙ <S%H4264><s%> of the camps לְצִבְאֹתָ֔ם <S%H6635><s%> throughout their hosts שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> [were] six מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> and three אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <S%H2572><s%> and fifty

וְהַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> But the Levites לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> were not הָתְפָּקְד֔וּ <S%H6485><s%> were not numbered בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> did בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> according to all that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses כֵּֽן־ <S%H3651><s%> so חָנ֤וּ <S%H2583><s%> so they pitched לְדִגְלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1714><s%> by their standards וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> and so נָסָ֔עוּ <S%H5265><s%> and so they set forward אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖יו <S%H4940><s%> after their families עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> according to the house אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers
